amendment.description: To improve housing assistance for veterans experiencing homelessness.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1140 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1140 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Padilla to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5160-5163) To improve housing assistance for veterans experiencing homelessness.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1140 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
